t: The Way of the Righteous and the End of the Ungodly
Blessed*pn is*i the man Who*ld walks not in the counsel of the ungodly, Nor*ld stands in the path of sinners, Nor*ld sits in the seat of the scornful;
But*ld his delight is*i in the law of the Lord,*s And*ld in His law he meditates day and night.
He*ld shall be like a tree Planted*ld by the rivers of water, That*ld brings forth its fruit in its season, Whose*ld leaf also shall not wither; And*ld whatever he does shall prosper.
The*ln ungodly are*i not so, But*ld are*i like the chaff which the wind drives away.
Therefore*ld the ungodly shall not stand in the judgment, Nor*ld sinners in the congregation of the righteous.
For*ln the Lord*s knows the way of the righteous, But*ld the way of the ungodly shall perish.
